items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: Comfortable and feels great. I like that fit, I can breathe, move and still look classy Read more
items.author: pamgrace gachenge

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a “WOW” gown!
items.body: This gown is a “WOW” gown and amazing for the price! It fits true to size, so know your bust-waist-hip measurements and order accordingly. I am 5’8”, 159lbs, size 12 and I ordered an XL. It is lightweight, and body-hugging. It fits exactly like the photo of my selected Amazon model that best represents my figure. When I received the gown, it fit me the very same way. It is stretchy and easy to move in. The long sleeves are mesh, so it can be worn year round. I wore this gown to a July wedding and received many compliments. Not only on the fit and style, but how daring my choice was to wear a leopard- print gown to the wedding! I intend to wear it out to a romantic dinner, a black tie function, my fall cruise and wear it this Christmas when I host my yearly Holiday Dinner! It’s a festive gown! Also, it came folded up in an 10-inch by 10-inch package, which when opened and I removed the gown to try it on, you could not see a wrinkle. Great “go to” travel gown! This gown does it all! Read more
items.author: Curvy in LA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: It’s stunning. It fits great, it hugs your figure in the right places. Is true to size. Quality amazes me. Read more
items.author: Lynoska

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leopard Print for the Win!
items.body: The dress exceeded my expectations! As a curvy petite women, 5'2 size 6, this dress hugged all the right places BUT could be warn without heels. I choose to purchase a size small, and was totally comfortable. The material is breathable but also durable for the fall season. Perfect, to use as a base for the transition to winter. The leopard print wasn't overwhelming, and received plenty of compliments. Read more
items.author: Leandra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely stunning dress
items.body: ✨ Absolutely Stunning Dress! ✨ I couldn’t be happier with this dress! The moment I put it on, I felt so elegant and confident. The fabric is high quality, soft, and flows beautifully. The fit is perfect — flattering in all the right places without feeling too tight or too loose. I received so many compliments when I wore it! Whether you’re going to a special event, a dinner, or just want to feel gorgeous, this dress is a must-have. It’s truly a piece that makes you feel beautiful inside and out. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: ivanna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length is too long for 5’3” lady
items.body: Beautiful dress & size is true to size. Sadly, the dress is too long for a 5’3” lady by about 6 inches too long. Read more
items.author: MJS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars great material and great dress!
items.body: THIS DRESS IS SO CUTE ON!! I SIZED UP but it has a lot of stretch to it, i'm giving it 4 stars only because i wish it was a tad longer, i'm 5'4 and it was hitting at my ankles. I got so many compliments on it and how it fit my body. definitely a 10/10. Read more
items.author: paige garner

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Multi Ginger, Multicolor, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
